string-array.item: First, let me tell you a little story.
Once upon a time, there was a software developer with a dream:
to create the next legendary video game.
video games require things like storylines, graphics, effort, and possibly pants.
So instead, he said, “Eh, jokes are basically free DLC for life,” and created this app. LOL.
